alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 13 at 1:29AM MDT until March 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations and Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains
